author: IGN
description:
If you've been wandering the deserts of Dune: Awakening wondering how to unlock and upgrade your character's skill trees, this is the guide for you. In this video, we walk you through how trainers work and exactly where to find both basic and advanced trainers for all five classes: Trooper, Planetologist, Mentat, Swordmaster, and Bene Gesserit.

00:00 - Intro  
00:36 - How trainers work  
02:20 - Trooper trainers  
03:51 - Planetologist trainers  
05:43 - Mentat trainers  
06:28 - Swordmaster training  
07:25 - Bene Gesserit training  
08:22 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming #DuneAwakening
title: Dune: Awakening - All Trainer Locations | Basic and Advanced

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Chicago Style' Featurette for Marvel Television's Ironheart, the latest Marvel Television series in the MCU distributed my Marvel Studios. Take a look at the behind-the-scenes look at how the filmmakers were able to shoot on-site in Chicago to ensure Chicago's heart makes it to the screen. Marvel Television's Ironheart premieres on June 24 exclusively on Disney+.

Genius teenage inventor Riri Williams creates the most advanced suit of armor since Iron Man. The story of the series follows the journey of Riri Williams days after her introduction in Black Panther: Wakanda Forever as she rises to the occasion to become Ironheart. She will face many friendly faces in her corner alongside adversaries such as The Hood.

Ironheart stars Dominique Throne, Anthony Ramos, Alden Ehrenreich, Manny Montana, Zoe Terakes, Lyric Ross, and more. The series is created by Chinaka Hodge alongside being executive produced by Ryan Coogler, Brad Winderbaum, and Zoie Nagelhout.

Marvel Televis
title: Marvel Television's Ironheart - Official 'Chicago Style' Behind the Scenes Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Xbox Pre-Order Trailer for Black Myth: Wukong, the hit action RPG developed by Game Science. Players will embark on a journey rooted in ancient Chinese mythology, based on Journey to the West, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. Embody the Destined One to overcome challenges, take on powerful enemies, and reveal the truth of the past. Black Myth: Wukong is launching on August 20 for Xbox Series X|S with the game being available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#BlackMythWukong #Gaming #IGN
title: Black Myth: Wukong - Official Xbox Pre-Order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the new 'Strength' 30 Second Spot for Superman, the upcoming DC Studios film distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. Don't miss the latest 30-Second Spot for Superman as he proclaims his greatest power is the humanity that resides within him. Superman is in theaters on July 11.

Superman stars David Corenswet in the dual role as Superman/Clark Kent, Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane, and Nicholas Hoult as Lex Luthor. The film also stars Skyler Gisondo as Jimmy Olsen, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Nathan Fillion, Isabela Merced, Sara Sampaio, Maria Gabriela de Faria, Wendell Pierce, Alan Tudyk, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Neva Howell, Beck Bennett as Steve Lombard, Mikaela Hoover as Cat Grant, and Christopher McDonald as Ron Troupe. 

Superman is executive produced by Nikolas Korda, Chantal Nong Vo and Lars Winther. Behind the camera, Gunn is joined by frequent collaborators, including director of photography Henry Braham, production designer Beth Mickle, costume designer Judianna Makov
title: Superman - Official 'Strength' 30 Second Spot (2025) David Corenswet, Nicholas Hoult

author: IGN
description:
Splitgate 2 reviewed by Jarrett Green on PlayStation 5. Also available on Xbox Series X/S and PC.
Splitgate 2 is a competent successor to the original that expands on it, but never really surpasses it. There still are few shooters you can play right now that feel as good as this one does to jump, float, and slide around in, and the new class system adds a tactical layer that sort of sacrifices the original’s philosophy of simplicity for the sake of mechanical depth. Weapons are good if largely uninspired (outside of the small handful of bangers you have to fight over in matches). But the map selection is a definite step backwards, both aesthetically and in the way they seem to discourage regular use of the shooter’s signature portals. Even though it packs in a lot of modes and content in a fair free-to-play game, the effort to bring Splitgate 2 more in line with other popular shooters has taken it a step too far away from what made the original a cult hit.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Splitgate 2 Review

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Meet the Delgados' Featurette for Jurassic World Rebirth, an upcoming installment in the hit dinosaur action film franchise distributed by Universal Pictures. Don't miss the latest featurette with the introduction of the Delgado family in Jurassic World Rebirth, an innocent family caught in the middle of dangerous ancient beings. Jurassic World Rebirth is in theaters on July 2.

Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, the planet’s ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures across land, sea and air within that tropical biosphere hold, in their DNA, the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind.

Scarlett Johansson plays skilled covert operations expert Zora Bennett, contracted to lead a skilled team on a top-secret mission to secure the genetic material. When Zora’s
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Official 'Meet the Delgados' Featurette (2025) Scarlett Johansson

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Tides of Terraria Animated Update Release Date Trailer for Palworld, an open-world creature collecting management survival game developed by Pocket Pair. An upcoming update will clash the worlds of Palworld and Terraria, allowing for the capturing and training of monsters from Terraria, weapons from the hit series, and facing off against Terraria's deadliest bosses yet. The Tides of Terraria Update for Palworld is launching on June 25 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Palworld #TidesOfTerraris #Terraria
title: Palworld x Terraria - Official Tides of Terraria Animated Update Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Accolades Trailer for Dune: Awakening, an open-world survival MMO based on the world of Dune developed by Funcom. Players will build, fight, and explore the relentless sand-filled world of Arrakis alone or with friends. Check out the latest trailer to garner the critical reception for Dune: Awakening, available now for PC (Steam) with a release on consoles at a later date.

#DuneAwakening #Gaming #IGN
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Fox Hunt Extended Look Trailer for Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, an upcoming remake of the classic tactical stealth action game developed by Virtuos Games. Players can get an extended look at the new multiplayer mode called Fox Hunt. In Fox Hunt, players will be greeted with a fresh new gameplay experience, with the tension of being the hunter or embodying a hunted player at the heart of Fox Hunt. Fox Hunt mode is launching with Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater in August 28 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#MetalGearSolidDelta #Gaming #IGN
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Official Fox Hunt Extended Look Trailer

author: IGN
description:
When a downtrodden janitor, Winston Gooze, is exposed to a catastrophic toxic accident, he’s transformed into a new kind of hero: The Toxic Avenger. Now, Toxie must rise from outcast to savior, taking on ruthless corporate overlords and corrupt forces who threaten his son, his friends, and his community. In a world where greed runs rampant… justice is best served radioactive. 

The film stars Peter Dinklage, Kevin Bacon, Elijah Wood, Taylour Paige, Jacob Tremblay, and Jane Levy. Written and directed by Macon Blair and based on Lloyd Kaufman's film of the same name, The Toxic Avenger opens in theaters on August 29, 2025.
title: The Toxic Avenger: Exclusive Red Band Trailer (2025) Peter Dinklage, Kevin Bacon

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Deep Dive Trailer for College Football 26, the latest addition to the American college football simulation game developed by EA Sports. Players can get the rundown on the new features and adjustments to the core gameplay from the Playbook Expansion, new player types and abilities, wear and tear adjustments, and more. College Football is launching on July 10 with the ability to preorder and get 3-day early access for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.

#CollegeFootball26 #Gaming #IGN
title: College Football 26 - Official Gameplay Deep Dive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this video, we dive into the brutal new Everdark Sovereign version of the Gaping Jaw boss. The Everdark Sovereigns are essentially “Hard Mode” versions of the current Nightlords, with a new one rotating in each week. These enhanced Day 3 bosses present an added challenge, featuring attacks not found in their original forms.

00:00 Gear Check  
00:10 Boss Appears  
00:19 Wave 2 Moves Instantly??  
00:27 Poison Doesn’t Stagger Anymore  
00:34 That Was Close  
00:40 Luck Ran Out  
00:48 Luck Returns!  
01:10 Panic Rolling  
01:18 First Death (My First Time Fighting Him!)  
01:39 He's a Tornado Now??  
01:50 I Don't Know What's Happening Anymore 
03:44 Phew  
04:03 None Of These Help Me 


#EldenRingNightreign #GapingJaw #Gaming
title: Elden Ring Nightrein: Gaping Jaw Hard Mode Gameplay (Everdark Sovereign)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Reveal Trailer for Blood Message, an upcoming third-person linear action-adventure game developed by 24 Entertainment Studio in conjunction with NetEase Thunder Fire. Players will embark on a journey set during the real-life Dunhuang Uprisings in 848 AD, making use of Unreal Engine 5. Embody a nameless protagonist sending a message eastward that could alter the course of his homeland forever. Blood Message is coming soon to consoles and PC.

#BloodMessage #Gaming #IGN
title: Blood Message - Official Reveal Trailer
